name: Waterpark - Slide Water Ball
description:
Welcome to Waterpark - Water balloon games , a hot summer game !
A free games with the best relax

Swimming is everyone's hobby. Being satisfied with the water in the water brings a great sense of encouragement.
And it will be really interesting when we play water balloon game

Now, you don't need to go swimming to experience this exciting game.

In game, Try to make a water ball bigger and bump it to opponents to flick them off the play field.
Void other enemy's ball that can sill you (you fall to the see)
And try to make your water ball and roll out the enemy

*Feature
* Amazing fun game play
* 13 different characters to collect.
* Slide and shoot the water balls to your victims.
* Stunning graphics
* Multiplayer mode in real time.
* Easy game but challenge to be the best

Enjoy with Waterpark - Water balloon game
Having fun with free games and download now !
